title: Banned for game crash and its BS
body: Basically I go in a ranked match and my game crashes and won't let me back in. I end up losing LP and I get banned for 5 games 20min. Not sure if riot can do anything just want to express my complaint because that is complete bull. Makes me want to stop playing

replies.body:
As *Calabok* mentioned, a single disconnection will not land you in a 5x 20min low-priority queue, as it takes a trend of disconnections to reach that penalty. 

If you give me a bit more detail as to what happens just before the crash and any error messages you receive, I can suggest the right steps to resolve this for good.
Punishment only happens when multiple leaves or disconnects happen in a short span of time. It does not kick in with only one disconnect.
